alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 4:14PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Cache and northeastern Box Elder Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 413 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Plymouth, or 13 miles northwest of Tremonton, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tremonton, Cache, Plymouth, Howell, Peter, Riverside, Benson, Garland, Mendon, Elwood, Fielding, Deweyville, Portage, Washakie, Collinston, Bothwell and Thatcher. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 375 and 400. Interstate 84 between mile markers 18 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
